page.title: 15Cowbridge Cattle Market
page.content: John Morgan only auctioneers in Cowbridge. The first farmer we interviewed was Mr. Evans and he was going to buy calves.He comes weekly.When he buys calves, he looks for the general appearance. He rears cows for beef. Mr. Green rears calves. He likes to buy Hereford Blacks.He too comes every week.When he buys animals he is concerned with the price. Mr. Brown comes weekly to sell sheep. His motto is "The price is in the pocket, the judge is in the eye!". All of the farmers came from the Vale of Glamorgan and the majority of them thought that Cowbridge was a good market. { Matthew Morgan, Michael Harbour, {Kirsty Wallace, Eleri Williams, {Gillian Manning and Natalie Willcox, {Felicity Cockbill, Michelle Bayley, {Lucy Clowes }
